entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is introduced as a person who speaks Parseltongue and is able to communicate with the man. He is described as moving forwards into the room, allowing the door to swing shut behind him.

entities.name: marvolo
entities.description: Marvolo is mentioned as a person who has died years ago.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is introduced as the man who claims to be Marvolo's son.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who feels a resentful admiration for Voldemort's complete lack of fear.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the person whose complete lack of fear Harry admires.

relationships.description: Riddle and Morfin are introduced as two separate individuals who interact with each other.
Marvolo is mentioned as the parent of Morfin, who claims to be his son.
